The four kinds of rebirth in a future li: Rebirth in the company of the gods of limited radiance
Rebirth in the company of the gods of limitless radiance
Rebirth in the company of the gods of corrupted radiance
Rebirth in the company of the gods of pure radiance
The limitless release of the heart [mn12: Meditating spreading a heart full of love to one direction, and to the second, and to the third, and to the fourth
Spreading a heart full of love to the whole world—abundant, expansive, limitless, free of enmity and ill will
Meditating spreading a heart full of compassion
Meditating spreading a heart full of rejoicing
Meditating spreading a heart full of equanimity to one direction, and to the second, and to the third, and to the fourth
Spreading a heart full of equanimity to the whole world—abundant, expansive, limitless, free of enmity and ill will
The expansive release of the heart (a ca: Meditating determined on pervading the extent of a single tree root as expansive
Meditating determined on pervading the extent of two or three tree roots
Meditating determined on pervading the extent of a single village district
Meditating determined on pervading the extent of two or three village districts
Meditating determined on pervading the extent of a single kingdom
Meditating determined on pervading the extent of two or three kingdoms
Meditating determined on pervading the extent of this land surrounded by ocean
The difference between the limitless rel: The limitless release of the heart is when a mendicant meditates spreading a heart full of love, compassion, rejoicing, and equanimity to the whole world
The expansive release of the heart is when a mendicant meditates determined on pervading the extent of a single tree root or more
The two differ in both meaning and phrasing
